mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.code, u.user_group_id, ug.name user_group_name, u.area_id, a.area_name, u.organization_id, o.organization_name, u.channel_id, c.name channel_name, j.job, j.duties, j.leader, j.age, j.sex, j.address, u.longitude, u.latitude, u.altitude, u.create_time FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_group ug on ug.id = u.user_group_id LEFT JOIN area a on a.id = u.area_id LEFT JOIN organization o on o.id = u.organization_id LEFT JOIN channel c on c.id = u.channel_id LEFT JOIN user_job j on u.job_id = j.id where 1=1 AND u.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, name, code, user_group_id, channel_id, area_id,organization_id,job_id, longitude, latitude, altitude, create_time ) values ( #{userId}, #{name}, #{code}, #{userGroupId}, #{channelId},#{areaId},#{organizationId},#{userJobId}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{altitude}, now())
insert into user_job (id, name,sex, job, duties, leader, age, address, create_time,user_id) values ( #{userJobId}, #{name},#{sex}, #{job}, #{duties}, #{leader}, #{age}, #{address}, now(),#{userId})
